command.name: SOP
command.syntax: /msg chanserv SOP <#channel> ADD <nick> /msg chanserv SOP <#channel> DEL <nick | index#> /msg ChanServ SOP <#channel> LIST
command.desc: This command is an alias to the ADDOP, DELOP, and LISTOP facilties except that it manipulates only ops at level 10 (SuperOp).
command.section: This command is provided for interface compatibility with services systems in use by other IRC networks.
(see /msg chanserv help listop, /msg chanserv help addop, and /msg chanserv help delop)

ex.pre: To grant Carlton level 10 op status on #sorcery
